comment.description: Deploy comment (e.g. what is being deployed).

rollbar_user.description: Rollbar username of the user who deployed.

url.description: Optional URL to submit the notification to.

environment.description: Name of the environment being deployed, e.g. 'production'.

validate_certs.description: If C(no), SSL certificates for the target url will not be validated. This should only be used on personally controlled sites using self-signed certificates.
